physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Pen and ink with wash on paperDimensions: 80 x 341 mm or smaller

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Watercolour, pen and ink and pencil on paper.The sketch drawn by Lieutenant Michael Houghton shows two sequential topographical views of the coastal region between Raumps [Al Rams, United Arab Emirates] and Ras-al-Khyma [Ra's al-Khaymah, United Arab Emirates].The views were sketched from on board ship and show several dhows and ‘Raumps’ settlement with latitude reported.
